text: kya ve log isee baat kee prateeksha kar rahe hain ki unake paas farishte aa jaayen, ya svayan unaka paalanahaar aa jaaye ya aapake paalanahaar kee koee aayat (nishaanee) aa jaaye?[1] jis din aapake paalanahaar kee koee nishaanee aa jaayegee, to kisee praanee ko usaka eemaan laabh nahin dega, jo pahale eemaan na laaya ho ya apane eemaan kee sthiti mein koee satkarm na kiya ho. aap kah den ki tum prateeksha karo, ham bhee prateeksha kar rahe hain
